extendedInfo.description: A fun widget of a Batman "Andy" Droid made entirely using UCCWLiven up your homescreen with BatAndy and assign apps/shortcuts to the Hotspots on the widgetYou MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or these skins WILL NOT work.****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer****Eight Hotspots available (See Picture) - All set to Open UCCW EditorEach Hotspot can be assigned to a different app/shortcut......Default has been set to 'Open UCCW Editor' for easy access to configurations. When you place the widget on your homescreen, touch any hotspot to begin assigning themAdding skin to your homescreen1. Add a 4x4 UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer2. Select Iron Andy from UCCW menu3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned)4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin if you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email meEnjoy and thank you :o)

reviews.title: Best UCCW Skin!!!
reviews.comment: I don\'t usually write reviews, but this is a must for any fan of Batman. It\'s amazing, but as said in description you need to download the UCCW in order to be able to use it. Thanks Bryan!
reviews.author: Jaime Su\303\241rez

reviews.comment: cant find it (other than to uninstall) so cant use it,brilliant useless app cheers

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can find or open it bull

reviews.title: Very nice...
reviews.comment: You can tell he put some tlc in making these. Great work.
reviews.author: Marcus Randolph

reviews.title: To those who think this is a standalone app
reviews.comment: You need to have UCCW installed. These are only skins for UCCW. They do nothing on their own. Perhaps if you read the description you would know that.
reviews.author: Robert Best
